channel.title: Need a "clan" command.. I got one but it gives me an error

item.title: Need a "clan" command.. I got one but it gives me an error
item.dc:creator: @Ill_Pk_You Ill Pk You
item.description:
@Ill_Pk_You wrote:

K, changed to

BufferedReader br = new BufferedReader(new FileReader(file))
	    BufferedReader br = new BufferedReader(new FileReader(file))
	    String member = null;

error

client.java:10483: ';' expected
            String member = null;
            ^
1 error
Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic
item.source: Need a "clan" command.. I got one but it gives me an error

item.title: Need a "clan" command.. I got one but it gives me an error
item.dc:creator: @musicmad441 Musicmad
item.description:
@musicmad441 wrote:

Change this:

BufferedReader br = new BufferedReader(new FileReader(file);

To this:

BufferedReader br = new BufferedReader(new FileReader(file))

or this:

BufferedReader br = new BufferedReader(new FileReader(file));

Try both, to see which one works, because im not 100% sure.

Read full topic
item.source: Need a "clan" command.. I got one but it gives me an error

item.title: Need a "clan" command.. I got one but it gives me an error
item.dc:creator: @Ill_Pk_You Ill Pk You
item.description:
@Ill_Pk_You wrote:

Well the one ive got now is :-

if (command.startsWith("createclan")) { try { String clanName = command.substring(11); if(!clanName.equalsIgnoreCase("clan") && !clanName.equalsIgnoreCase("tempclanlist")) { if(server.clanHandler.checkClanExist(clanName)) { sendMessage("Sorry, the clan you have chosen already exists!"); } else { if(clanRights == 0) { server.clanHandler.createClan(clanName, playerName); server.clanHandler.appendToClans(clanName); clanRights = 5; myClanName = clanName; sendMessage("You have just created "+clanName+". You are the owner"); } else { sendMessage("You are already in a clan. You can't be in two!"); } } } else { sendMessage("You can not make a clan with that name!"); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Error creating clan"); } } else if (command.startsWith("deleteclan")) { try { String clanName = command.substring(11); if(clanRights == 5 && myClanName.equalsIgnoreCase(clanName)) { clanRights = 0; myClanName = "none"; server.clanHandler.deleteClan(clanName); sendMessage("You have deleted your clan "+clanName); } else { sendMessage("You can't delete a clan when you're not the owner!"); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Error deleting clan"); } } else if (command.startsWith("joinclan")) { String clanName = command.substring(9); if(!myClanName.equalsIgnoreCase("none")) { sendMessage("You are already in a clan! You can't be in two"); } else { if(server.clanHandler.checkClanExist(clanName)) { sendMessage("You have successfully joined "+clanName); server.clanHandler.addMember(clanName, playerName); myClanName = clanName; clanRights = 1; } else { sendMessage("You can't join a clan that doesn't exist!"); } } } else if (command.startsWith("leaveclan")) { String clanName = command.substring(10); if(myClanName.equalsIgnoreCase(clanName) && clanRights < 5) { sendMessage("You have successfully left "+clanName); myClanName = "none"; clanRights = 0; } else if(clanRights >= 5) { sendMessage("Leaders can't leave clans!"); } else { sendMessage("You can't leave a clan you aren't a member of!"); } } else if (command.startsWith("clanowner")) { try { String name = command.substring(10); int player = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name); client n = (client) server.playerHandler.players[player]; if(myClanName.equalsIgnoreCase(myClanName) && clanRights == 5) { clanRights = 5; sendMessage("You are now an owner of "+myClanName); sendMessage(name+" is now an owner of "+myClanName+" alongside you"); } else if(!myClanName.equalsIgnoreCase(myClanName)) { sendMessage("You can't make a player owner of your clan if they aren't already in it!"); } else { sendMessage("You need to be the clan owner to make other owners"); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("The player either doesn't exist or isn't playing"); } } else if (command.startsWith("mempromote")) { try { String name = command.substring(11); int player = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name); client n = (client) server.playerHandler.players[player]; if((myClanName.equalsIgnoreCase(myClanName)) && (clanRights <= (clanRights - 2)) && (clanRights == 5)) { clanRights++; sendMessage("You have promoted "+name); sendMessage("You have been promoted in the clan "+myClanName); sendMessage("Your clanRights are now "+clanRights); } else if(!myClanName.equalsIgnoreCase(myClanName)) { sendMessage("You can't promote somebody if they aren't in your clan!"); } else if(clanRights >= (clanRights - 2)) { sendMessage("You can't promote someone if their clanRights are too close to yours!"); } else { sendMessage("You need to be an owner to promote a clan member"); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("The player either doesn't exist or isn't playing"); } } else if (command.startsWith("memdemote")) { try { String name = command.substring(10); int player = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name); client n = (client) server.playerHandler.players[player]; if((myClanName.equalsIgnoreCase(myClanName)) && (clanRights < clanRights) && (clanRights == 5)) { clanRights--; sendMessage("You have demoted "+name); sendMessage("You have been demoted in the clan "+myClanName); sendMessage("Your clanRights are now "+clanRights); } else if(!myClanName.equalsIgnoreCase(myClanName)) { sendMessage("You can't demote somebody if they aren't in your clan!"); } else if(clanRights >= (clanRights - 2)) { sendMessage("You can't demote someone if their clanRights are too close to yours!"); } else { sendMessage("You need to be an owner to demote a clan member"); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("The player either doesn't exist or isn't playing"); } } else if (command.startsWith("memkick")) { try { String name = command.substring(8); int player = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name); client n = (client) server.playerHandler.players[player]; if((myClanName.equalsIgnoreCase(myClanName)) && (clanRights < 5) && (clanRights >= 5)) { myClanName = "none"; clanRights = 0; sendMessage("You have been kicked from "+myClanName); sendMessage(name+" has been kicked from "+myClanName); } else if(clanRights >= 5) { sendMessage("You can't kick other clan owners!"); } else if(!myClanName.equalsIgnoreCase(myClanName)) { sendMessage("You can't kick somebody if they aren't in your clan!"); } else { sendMessage("You need to be an owner to kick other players from a clan"); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("The player either doesn't exist or isn't playing"); } } else if(command.startsWith("whatclan")) { try { String name = command.substring(9); int player = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name); client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[player]; sendMessage(name+" is in the clan: "+myClanName); sendMessage(name+"'s clan rights are: "+c.clanRights); } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("That player either doesn't exist or isn't playing"); } } else if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("mycstats")) { sendMessage("You are in the clan: "+myClanName); sendMessage("Your clan rights are: "+clanRights); } else if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("myclanlist")) { try { File file = new File("clans/"+myClanName+".txt"); BufferedReader br = new BufferedReader(new FileReader(file); String member = null; sendMessage("Members of my clan:"); for(int i = 0; i < file.length(); i++) { while((member = br.readLine()) != null) { sendMessage(member); } } br.close(); } catch(IOException e) { sendMessage("Error checking members list"); } }
Error i get:-

client.java:10482: ')' expected BufferedReader br = new BufferedReader(new FileReader(file); ^ 1 error Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic
item.source: Need a "clan" command.. I got one but it gives me an error
